title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.3 - Operation of vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.3 - Operation of vehicles

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated carelessly or negligently, or in
disregard of the rights or safety of others, or without due caution and
circumspection, or in a manner so as to endanger unreasonably or to be likely
to endanger unreasonably persons or property, or while the operator is under
the influence of intoxicating liquors or any narcotic or habit-forming drug, nor shall any vehicle be so constructed, equipped or loaded as to endanger
unreasonably, or to be likely to endanger unreasonably, persons or
property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
302.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
